member.name: T:Windows.Security.Isolation.IsolatedWindowsEnvironment
member.summary: Create and manage Hypervisor-based Isolated Environments for applications to open and process untrusted data in a virtualized environment to protect the host operating system from potentially malicious content in the file.

member.name: P:Windows.Security.Isolation.IsolatedWindowsEnvironment.Id
member.summary: Returns ID for Isolated Windows Environment.

member.name: M:Windows.Security.Isolation.IsolatedWindowsEnvironment.CreateAsync(Windows.Security.Isolation.IsolatedWindowsEnvironmentOptions)
member.summary: Create an Isolated Windows Environment asynchronously.
member.param: Isolated Windows Environment configuration options defined by isolatedwindowsenvironmentoptions

member.name: M:Windows.Security.Isolation.IsolatedWindowsEnvironment.CreateAsync(Windows.Security.Isolation.IsolatedWindowsEnvironmentOptions,Windows.Security.Isolation.IsolatedWindowsEnvironmentTelemetryParameters)
member.summary: Create an Isolated Windows Environment Asynchronously and correlate with telemetry events.
member.param: Isolated Windows Environment configuration options defined by isolatedwindowsenvironmentoptions

member.name: M:Windows.Security.Isolation.IsolatedWindowsEnvironment.FindByOwnerId(System.String)
member.summary: Returns a list of Isolated Windows Environments registered to specific owner.
member.param: Unique identifier for owner of Isolated Windows Environment.

member.name: M:Windows.Security.Isolation.IsolatedWindowsEnvironment.GetById(System.String)
member.summary: Returns reference to the Isolated Windows Environment based on the ID.
member.param: ID assigned to an Isolated Windows Environment.

member.name: M:Windows.Security.Isolation.IsolatedWindowsEnvironment.LaunchFileWithUIAsync(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Allows applications to open files in an Isolated Windows Environment.
member.param: String to specify the relative position of filepath with respect to other arguments to be passed:
String for path of file to be opened in Isolated Windows Environment.

member.name: M:Windows.Security.Isolation.IsolatedWindowsEnvironment.LaunchFileWithUIAsync(System.String,System.String,System.String,Windows.Security.Isolation.IsolatedWindowsEnvironmentTelemetryParameters)
member.summary: Allows applications to open files in an Isolated Windows Environment with telemetry correlation.
member.param: String to specify the relative position of filepath with respect to other arguments to be passed:
String for path of file to be opened in Isolated Windows Environment

member.name: M:Windows.Security.Isolation.IsolatedWindowsEnvironment.RegisterMessageReceiver(System.Guid,Windows.Security.Isolation.MessageReceivedCallback)
member.summary: Register message receiver callback.

member.name: M:Windows.Security.Isolation.IsolatedWindowsEnvironment.ShareFolderAsync(System.String,Windows.Security.Isolation.IsolatedWindowsEnvironmentShareFolderRequestOptions)
member.summary: Share host folder with Isolated Windows Environment.

member.name: M:Windows.Security.Isolation.IsolatedWindowsEnvironment.ShareFolderAsync(System.String,Windows.Security.Isolation.IsolatedWindowsEnvironmentShareFolderRequestOptions,Windows.Security.Isolation.IsolatedWindowsEnvironmentTelemetryParameters)
member.summary: Share host folder with Isolated Windows Environment with telemetry correlation.
member.param: String of of host folder name.

member.name: M:Windows.Security.Isolation.IsolatedWindowsEnvironment.StartProcessSilentlyAsync(System.String,System.String,Windows.Security.Isolation.IsolatedWindowsEnvironmentActivator)
member.summary: Allow processes to execute inside an Isolated Windows Environment.

member.name: M:Windows.Security.Isolation.IsolatedWindowsEnvironment.StartProcessSilentlyAsync(System.String,System.String,Windows.Security.Isolation.IsolatedWindowsEnvironmentActivator,Windows.Security.Isolation.IsolatedWindowsEnvironmentTelemetryParameters)
member.summary: Allow processes to execute inside an Isolated Windows Environment with telemetry correlation.

member.name: M:Windows.Security.Isolation.IsolatedWindowsEnvironment.TerminateAsync
member.summary: Terminate Isolated Windows Environment asynchronously.

member.name: M:Windows.Security.Isolation.IsolatedWindowsEnvironment.TerminateAsync(Windows.Security.Isolation.IsolatedWindowsEnvironmentTelemetryParameters)
member.summary: Terminate Isolated Windows Environment asynchronously with telemetry correlation.

member.name: M:Windows.Security.Isolation.IsolatedWindowsEnvironment.UnregisterMessageReceiver(System.Guid)
member.summary: Unregisters message receiver callback.

member.summary: Returns of various IsolatedWindowsEnvironmentOptions for the Isolated Windows Environment.

member.summary: Boolean of whether applications running inside Isolated Windows Environment can access the device’s camera and microphone.

member.summary: Enum of clipboard formats for Isolated Windows Environment.

member.summary: Boolean of whether Isolated Windows Environment renders graphics using hardware or software acceleration.

member.summary: Enum of printer selections for Isolated Windows Environment.

member.summary: Enum of clipboard direction options for Isolated Windows Environment.

member.summary: String that identifies the owner of each Isolated Windows Environment created.

member.name: P:Windows.Security.Isolation.IsolatedWindowsEnvironmentOptions.PersistUserProfile
member.summary: Allows user profile to persist in the Isolated Windows Environment from session to session.

member.name: P:Windows.Security.Isolation.IsolatedWindowsEnvironmentOptions.SharedFolderNameInEnvironment
member.summary: Display name of the folder used to sharing untrusted item inside the Isolated Windows Environment set by calling ShareHostFolderForUntrustedItems.

member.name: P:Windows.Security.Isolation.IsolatedWindowsEnvironmentOptions.SharedHostFolderPath
member.summary: Path of host folder that is shared between the Isolated Windows Environment and the host for sharing of untrusted items set by calling ShareHostFolderForUntrustedItems.

member.name: M:Windows.Security.Isolation.IsolatedWindowsEnvironmentOptions.ShareHostFolderForUntrustedItems(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Sets both SharedFolderNameInEnvironment and SharedHostFolderPath to configure folder to be shared for sharing of untrusted items with the Isolated Windows Environment.
member.param: Name of folder in Isolated Windows Environment.

member.name: T:Windows.Security.Isolation.IsolatedWindowsEnvironmentOwnerRegistration
member.summary: Runtime class that registers a list of attributes of the owner of the Isolated Windows Environment. This includes the owner name, shareable folders from host to Isolated Windows Environment, processes that run as User or System, and cross-environment activation extentions.
